quote: Upon the sad sunset of my decline
author: Pushkin, Elegy

quote: You're a perfect child, prince! However, I notice that you keep treating me like...a porcelain cup
author: Ippolit Terentyev, The Idiot

quote: But now, owing to the extraordinaries of the human heart, it so happened...
author: third-person omniscient narrator

quote: There's only truth about it, and it makes it unfair
author: Aglaya, The Idiot

quote: AMD—Ave Mater Dei (Hail, Mother of God)
author: Aglaya, The Idiot
